snippet: The move, days after the banker who led the group left the firm, comes as Wall Street focuses on helping companies respond to dissident investors.
abstract: DealBook Online; Goldman Sachs names Steven Barg and Avinash Mehrotra to lead its activism defense practice in wake of defection of William Anderson to Evercore Partners.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: The move, days after the banker who led the group left the firm, comes as Wall Street focuses on helping companies respond to dissident investors.

headline.main: Goldman Restructures Its Activism Defense Team
